text: "Humans Being" is a 1996 song by Van Halen. It was taken from their greatest hits album Best Of â€“ Volume I and was used in the 1996 movie Twister. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks chart and was released in Japan. == References == Category:1996 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Van Halen songs
title: Humans Being
